programName: Lines and Swirls: Foundational Drawing and Painting Techniques
description: This course will start by reviewing the basic drawing methods like shapes, perspectives, and shading in order to bring life to everyday sketches. Then, we'll transition into the vibrant world of painting, exploring popular mediums like watercolor, acrylics, and oils. You'll learn about color theory, blending techniques, and brushwork to start experimenting with creating unique creative expressions of your own.
about: World Debate Stars with the Harvard MUN Team is a course spread over two weekends and is led by qualified Student Mentors who have gained valuable experience debating through their involvement competing on the collegiate MUN circuit.

schedule.description:
Theme: The Fundamentals of Argumentation
Students will attend a webinar on creating convincing arguments, focusing on rhetorical strategies and selection of evidence for arguments.
Topic 1: Rhetorical Strategies in Debate
Topic 2: The Keystone of an Argument: Evidence

Students will attend a webinar on counterarguments, focusing on anticipating what others might say and effective methods of rebuttal.
Topic 1: Planning for Your Opponent’s Argument
Topic 2: Refute and Rebut: The Core of a Counterargument

Theme: Thinking on Your Feet
Students will attend a webinar on necessary debate skills, focusing on public speaking in debate and ways to capture attention in an argument.
Topic 1: Being a Successful Orator in Debate
Topic 2: All Eyes on Me: Standing Out in an Argument

1 - Students will attend a session on coming up with arguments on the spot, focusing on general frameworks for building an argument and strategies for avoiding getting flustered in a debate.
2 - Mock Debate

programName: TikTok and Instagram Reels: Art Business Models and Marketing in a Digital World
description: This course will explore the dynamic intersection of art and business, focusing on how artists and art organizations can thrive in today's changing market. We'll review various business models used in the art world, from traditional gallery representations to social media platforms. You'll learn about pricing strategies, marketing techniques, and the role of digital media in promoting and selling art. We'll also discuss important topics like artist-brand collaborations and the impact of global market trends on the art industry.

programName: Building Your Business Plan: From Idea to Execution
description: This masterclass is designed to guide you through the intricacies of creating a robust business plan. From conceptualizing your ideas to executing them effectively, gain valuable insights that will empower you on your entrepreneurial path.

description: This course will explore the fascinating journey of human development from infancy through adulthood. You'll gain insights into how people grow and change psychologically over the course of their lives. We'll cover key theories and research in areas such as cognitive, social, and emotional development, and discuss how these aspects interact to shape personality and behavior. This course will also delve into the impact of genetic, environmental, and cultural factors on development.
